ygData.subject: Re: trade question
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a sort of new bard on Bertoxx. I am currently dual weilding Obsidian shards. This gives me two decent (6/25) weapons, that both proc a 30 point damage.
ygData.messageBody:
I play a sort of new bard on Bertoxx.

I am currently dual weilding Obsidian shards. This gives me two decent (6/25) weapons, that both proc a 30
point damage.

One problem is that these weapons cause more taunting with my songs than a lvl 26 Warrior I hunt with. =)

Jeff Illian wrote:

> From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>
>
> I've been having stamina problems duel wielding an obsidian scimitar and a
> dragoon dirk in long battles. I'm currently trying to figure out what to
> replace the scimitar with, but I'm not all that sure of the trade value of
> it. I've got an offer on the table of a Silvery War Axe for the Obsidian
> Scimitar. Is this a good trade?
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
